name: ball of destruction
description:
in this breakout type of game you must break all the yellow blocks . have fun

the music is from bensound.com it is called going higher and is royalty free

heres a link if anyone would like to use it in there games 

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/going-higher

i aswell used sfxr for sound effects

https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

w,a,s,d to move and mouse to shoot
